comments.text:
+beer can +Tom Goffnett Apologies, but I believe you've mistaken my point. 
Perhaps I should have been more specific. I'm not trying to say the media 
shouldn't report these cases and I'm not saying nobody should do anything 
about police abusing their power. All I'm trying to say is there are people 
out there who hate all police officers and assume they are all bad when 
this is not the case. Everyone eats these kinds of stories up and then 
people go on to talk about how all police are corrupted and how there's so 
much police brutality in America and it's really not true. This subject 
gets blown out of proportion way too quickly. And don't even get me started 
on the whole racist police conspiracy bullshit. You break the law, the 
police catch you, and whatever happens to you in between isn't because of 
your skin color, it's because you were breaking the fucking law. That's how 
things work.

comments.text:
+Josh J   Over 1,000 people were killed by cops in 2013.  You won't be able 
to verify that number because the FBI doesn't keep track of how many of our 
countrymen are murdered by cops.  Needless to say, it is a huge number. 
Anything over 50 would be an outrage.  Speaking of 50, that is about how 
many cops (city, county, state and federal) are killed by firearms each 
year. You know that at least 90% of those were probably cops making a 
fixable situation impossible and the other 10% were friendly fire.  It is 
time to disarm cops - for the safety of our countrymen.  For purposes of 
National Security - for our own protection.  

How many U.S. citizens were killed by terrorist in the last five years? Not 
counting the drone strikes on Americans. 

For Jyrgenstrator's safety, I hope he stays out of the U.S. until we get 
this fixed.  Shame on all of us.  We can't even get the U.S. attorney 
general to assure us that the U.S. Federal government won't use drone 
strikes on its citizens in the United States.

comments.text: +Jesse Gutierrez You're DEF not alone on this one, Jess.
comments.author: Kittie Katz

comments.text:
Ok so I am all alone on this one? Alright, as long as I got my two cents 
out on the subject I am happy! Its just that when I saw this I thought of 
how badly my Grandpa was treated at a WORTHLESS place, that actually caused 
his death! And as in this poor old guys case, there was NOTHING I could do!
comments.author: Jesse Gutierrez
